title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 70.4 - Examination security and test scheduling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 70.4 - Examination security and test scheduling

State Regulations

To facilitate the security of examination materials, a test
shall be administered only on the announced date (if any), with due provision
being made for religious observance; provided, however, the State Department of

Civil Service may provide for rescheduling the administration of a test to a
candidate under such circumstances of personal hardship and under such
conditions as may be defined by that department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
70.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
